API Collection# FixedWidthInteger Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Operators)

[`static func &* (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&*(_:_:))Returns the product of the two given values, wrapping the result in case of any overflow.[`static func &*= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&*=(_:_:))Multiplies two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable, wrapping any overflow.[`static func &+ (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&+(_:_:))Returns the sum of the two given values, wrapping the result in case of any overflow.[`static func &+= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&+=(_:_:))Adds two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable, wrapping any overflow.[`static func &- (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&-(_:_:))Returns the difference of the two given values, wrapping the result in case of any overflow.[`static func &-= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&-=(_:_:))Subtracts the second value from the first and stores the difference in the left-hand-side variable, wrapping any overflow.[`static func &<< (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__(_:_:)-1s44o)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &<< <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__(_:_:)-23wlt)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &>> <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__(_:_:)-4pl2m)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &<< (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__(_:_:)-5j3zt)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &>> (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__(_:_:)-6qf3)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &>> (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__(_:_:)-u6vr)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &>>= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__=(_:_:)-4eicd)Calculates the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width, and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func &<<= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&__=(_:_:)-4iwdg)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width, and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.### [Initializers](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init<T>(T)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(_:)-5nfkl)[`init?(String)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(_:)-6powq)Creates a new integer value from the given string.[`init?<S>(S, radix: Int)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(_:radix:))Creates a new integer value from the given string and radix.[`init(bigEndian: Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(bigendian:))Creates an integer from its big-endian representation, changing the byte order if necessary.[`init?<T>(exactly: T)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(exactly:)-8acu7)[`init(littleEndian: Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(littleendian:))Creates an integer from its little-endian representation, changing the byte order if necessary.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var bigEndian: Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/bigendian)The big-endian representation of this integer.[`var littleEndian: Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/littleendian)The little-endian representation of this integer.### [Type Methods](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Type-Methods)

[`static func random(in: ClosedRange<Self>) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/random(in:)-512t7)Returns a random value within the specified range.[`static func random(in: Range<Self>) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/random(in:)-5jx03)Returns a random value within the specified range.[`static func random<T>(in: ClosedRange<Self>, using: inout T) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/random(in:using:)-7a3q0)Returns a random value within the specified range, using the given generator as a source for randomness.[`static func random<T>(in: Range<Self>, using: inout T) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/random(in:using:)-8uepg)Returns a random value within the specified range, using the given generator as a source for randomness.
